item.title: 纳斯达克和 Cboe 就更新后的股票交易规则挑战美国证券交易委员会
item.description: 纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc）和 Cboe 全球市场公司（Cboe Global Markets Inc）这两家最大的证券交易所对美国证券交易委员会（US Securities and Exchange Commission）改变股票交易经济结构的新规定提出了质疑。【原文：Nasdaq Inc. and Cboe Global Markets Inc., two of the biggest stock exchanges, challenged a new US Securities and Exchange Commission rule that changes the economic structure of how stocks trade.】

item.title: 认识托尼-欣奇克里夫--这位搞砸了特朗普纽约集会的喜剧演员和播客
item.description:
这位在乔-罗根喜剧俱乐部主持每周播客的辱华喜剧演员说 他搬到奥斯汀是为了  "更好的高尔夫 "和 "更好的人"

。【原文：

The insult comic, who hosts a popular weekly podcast at Joe Rogan’s comedy club, said he moved to Austin for ‘better golf’ and ‘better people’

】

item.title: 新加坡、加拿大基金酝酿支持 18 亿美元资产大洗牌
item.description: 加拿大最大的养老基金和新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）正在进行深入谈判，以支持 PSG Equity 将 18 亿美元的公司股权转移到专为此类资产转移设计的新工具中的计划。【原文：Canada’s largest pension fund and Singapore’s GIC Pte are in advanced talks to back PSG Equity’s plan to transfer $1.8 billion of company stakes into a new vehicle designed specifically for this type of asset-shifting.】

item.title: 凯勒-萨特称瑞银资本水平取决于解决计划
item.description: 瑞士财政部长卡琳-凯勒-萨特（Karin Keller-Sutter）表示，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）必须为其海外分支机构维持的额外资本水平在很大程度上取决于该银行对紧急情况的准备程度。【原文：Swiss Finance Minister Karin Keller-Sutter said that the level of extra capital that UBS Group AG will have to maintain against its foreign units depends largely on how well the bank prepares for an emergency scenario.】

item.title: 汽车保险公司实现首次盈利后，Root 在有史以来最好的一天飙升 192
item.description: 汽车保险平台 Root Inc. 宣布实现历史上首次盈利后，其股价在周四迎来了有史以来最好的一天。【原文：Root Inc. shares are having their best day ever on Thursday after the auto insurance platform announced that it had turned profitable for the first time in its history.】

item.title: 埃克森同意向 Pluspetrol 出售阿根廷页岩油资产
item.description: 据知情人士透露，埃克森美孚公司已同意将其在阿根廷瓦卡穆埃尔塔页岩区的大部分资产出售给 Pluspetrol SA 公司。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. has agreed to sell most of its assets in Argentina’s Vaca Muerta shale patch to Pluspetrol SA, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气买家接近达成阿塞拜疆协议以维持乌克兰天然气供应
item.description: 欧洲买家即将与阿塞拜疆达成一项商业协议，以便在俄罗斯与乌克兰之间的过境协议于今年年底到期后，继续向欧洲大陆输送天然气。【原文：European buyers are nearing a commercial agreement with Azerbaijan to keep natural gas flowing to the continent after a transit deal between Russia and Ukraine expires at the end of the year.】

item.title: OpenAI 为 ChatGPT 带来搜索功能，向谷歌发起挑战
item.description:
新选项将使聊天机器人的用户能够像在网络上一样及时搜索信息。【原文：

The new option will let the chatbot’s users search for timely information much as they would on the web.

】

item.title: 匈牙利欧尔班面临福林疲软和经济脆弱的两难选择
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）面临着一个难题，即如何使他的国家走出衰退，因为货币疲软限制了货币和预算刺激措施的范围。【原文：Hungary’s Prime Minister Viktor Orban faces a conundrum how to bring his country out of a recession as the weakening currency limits the scope for monetary and budget stimulus.】

item.title: 房贷利率连续第五周上涨，30 年期房贷利率达到 6.72
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率连续第五周上升。【原文：Mortgage rates in the US rose for the fifth week in a row.】

item.title: 微策略公司 210 亿美元股权计划创下特斯拉最高纪录
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc.）计划出售创纪录的 210 亿美元新股，以增加其比特币储备，从而开启了一个将远远超过埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.）四年前设定的里程碑的计划。【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. laid out plans to sell a record $21 billion in new shares to add to its stockpile of Bitcoin, opening the door to a program that would far surpass the milestone Elon Musk’s Tesla Inc. set about four years ago.】

item.title: Kraken公司任命Dapper公司的Stephanie Lemmerman为首席财务官，以应对人事变动
item.description: Kraken 任命斯蒂芬妮-莱默曼（Stephanie Lemmerman）为首席财务官，这是美国加密货币交易所本周宣布的大范围重组中最新的一次高管调整。【原文：Kraken named Stephanie Lemmerman as chief financial officer, the latest executive suite reshuffling by the US crypto exchange as part of wide-ranging restructuring announced this week.】

item.title: Alphabet 为谷歌地图添加人工智能，抵御苹果等后起之秀
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司宣布为其两款地图应用程序增加新功能，这是该搜索巨头利用双子座人工智能模型改造产品的持续努力的一部分。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google announced new features for its two mapping apps, part of the search giant’s ongoing effort to revamp products with its Gemini artificial intelligence models.】

item.title: 陷入困境的兼并公司在美国大选中看到了交易催化剂
item.description: 美国大选让华尔街的许多人目不转睛。对于兼并套利交易商来说，选举结果事关重大，也是他们重振颓势的机会。【原文：The US election has much of Wall Street riveted. For merger-arbitrage traders, there’s a lot riding on the outcome, and a chance to revive their sagging fortunes.】

item.title: 审计员辞职后，超微 2024 年股价转为负值
item.description: 超级微电脑公司（Super Micro Computer Inc.【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. shares turned negative for the year on Thursday, as cascading concerns about the server maker’s finances continued to weigh on the stock.】

item.title: 贝莱德试图模仿先锋的独家节税基金
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）正寻求复制一个独特的基金蓝图，帮助其客户在二十年间节省数十亿美元的税款，从而在头号竞争对手面前赢得优势。【原文：BlackRock Inc. is looking to gain ground over its top rival as it seeks to replicate a unique fund blueprint that helped Vanguard Group Inc. save its clients billions of dollars on taxes for two decades.】

item.title: 大都会人寿称 2025 年商业地产前景将有所改善
item.description: MetLife Inc.首席财务官约翰-麦卡里昂（John McCallion）认为，随着相关基金回报率的提高以及经济形势的支持，2025 年的商业地产前景看好。【原文：MetLife Inc. Chief Financial Officer John McCallion sees a positive outlook for commercial real estate in 2025 amid improving returns from related funds as well as supportive economic conditions.】

item.title: 维克托-什韦茨为什么中国现在需要 "不负责任"？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。今天，我们将为您带来麦格理资本（Macquarie Capital）全球服务台战略主管 Viktor Shvets 的观点。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.Today, we’re bringing you thoughts from Viktor Shvets, Head of Global Desk Strategy at Macquarie Capital and a favorite】

item.title: 瑞士启动刑事调查后，瑞银仍卷入莫桑比克案
item.description: 去年年底，瑞士检方披露已展开刑事调查，此后，震惊瑞信的莫桑比克船舶融资丑闻继续困扰着瑞银集团。【原文：The Mozambique ship-financing scandal that rocked Credit Suisse continues to haunt UBS Group AG, after Swiss prosecutors revealed they opened a criminal probe late last year.】

item.title: 近十年后，中国的 "2025 制造 "取得了成功
item.description:
为什么我们的限制不起作用？【原文：

Why us restrictions didn’t work.

】

item.title: 英国预算案对市场意味着什么？问答实录
item.description: 在《今日市场》博客的现场问答中，我们请新闻编辑室的专家们分析了英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）的首份预算案。【原文：In a live Q&A on the Markets Today blog, we asked experts from around the newsroom for their analysis of UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves’s first budget.】

item.title: 挪威警告三文鱼养殖者做好应对水母袭击的准备
item.description: 挪威监管机构警告说，挪威的三文鱼养殖户应采取措施，应对水母对其鱼类资源的影响。【原文：Salmon farmers in Norway should put in place measures to deal with the impact of jellyfish on their fish stocks, the country’s regulator has warned.】

item.title: 丹麦基金 ATP 下调陷入困境的 Northvolt 的股权价值
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，丹麦最大的养老基金 ATP 因持有现金拮据的电池制造商 Northvolt AB 的股份，已对其价值 60 亿美元的非上市资产组合进行了减值。【原文：Denmark’s biggest pension fund, ATP, has marked down the value of its $6 billion unlisted assets portfolio as a result of its stake in cash-strapped battery maker Northvolt AB, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 自由港因印尼铜厂存在地震风险遭美国证券交易委员会调查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国证券交易委员会正在调查自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport-McMoRan Inc.【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission is looking into whether Freeport-McMoRan Inc. failed to disclose threats a severe earthquake could pose to its new $3.7 billion copper smelter complex in Indonesia, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 随着数据市场的发展，故宫博物院推出私人股票价格
item.description: 纳斯达克私募市场有限责任公司（Nasdaq Private Market LLC）公开发布了一款针对私募公司的专有定价产品，加入了竞争日益激烈的潜在 IPO 候选公司数据领域。【原文：Nasdaq Private Market LLC is publicly launching a proprietary pricing product for private companies, joining an increasingly competitive space for data on potential IPO candidates.】

item.title: 谷歌赢得英国对其 YouTube 短裤品牌的商标裁决
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌赢得了一场保留 YouTube Shorts 品牌名称的法律诉讼，避免了在全球范围内重新命名其流行短视频格式的可能性，该格式的竞争对手是 TikTok 和 Instagram Reels。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google won a legal battle to keep the YouTube Shorts brand name, avoiding a potential global re-branding of its popular short videos format rival to TikTok and Instagram Reels.】

item.title: 货币交易商为全球波动性激增做好准备
item.description: 在下周对冲美元走势的成本攀升至2020年初以来最昂贵的水平后，交易员们正准备应对全球货币波动的激增。【原文：Traders are preparing for a surge in currency volatility around the world after the cost of hedging dollar moves over the next week climbed to the most expensive since early 2020.】

item.title: 消费者持续消费，万事达卡盈利超出预期
item.description: 万事达卡公司（Mastercard Inc.【原文：Mastercard Inc. reported profit that beat analysts’ estimates, helped by a boost in cross-border transactions.】

item.title: 需求居高不下，挪威邮轮公司再次上调业绩展望
item.description: 挪威邮轮公司（Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd.）今年第四次上调了利润预期，原因是市场对邮轮航行的需求仍然很高，这打破了人们对休闲旅游业增长放缓的担忧。【原文：Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. boosted its profit outlook for a fourth time this year as demand for sailings remains high, defying fears a slowdown in the wider leisure travel industry.】

item.title: 用户持续增长，Roblox 业绩超出预期
item.description: 视频游戏平台 Roblox 公司公布的第三季度预订额超出了分析师的预期，因为该游戏平台的用户数量和使用时间都在持续增长。【原文：Video game platform Roblox Corp. reported third-quarter bookings that beat analysts’ expectations as the gaming platform continues to grow its users and the time they spend there.】
